message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to negotiate if you have a better idea.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Time is ticking and inflation is eating away at our potential gains.
I understand your desire for a larger share, but 60/40 is too uneven. I'm willing to give up a little more from my initial offer, but I need to see some compromise on your end.
Alice, this is a serious offer.  45/55 is a compromise, reflecting the time pressure and inflation. I'm willing to negotiate further, but the split needs to be fairer than your previous proposals.
